remarks: The modular law for projective subspaces.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmod.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmod.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pmod.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmodN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X i^i ( Y .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) ) = ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) ) $.
